sentences.en: A piece of china crunched under my foot.

sentences.cn: 中国一直令我心驰神往。

sentences.en: Exquisite china soup dishes reposed on silver plates.
sentences.cn: 银盘子上面摆放着精制的陶瓷汤盘。

sentences.en: Get out your best china and crystal.
sentences.cn: 拿出你最好的瓷器和水晶玻璃器皿。

sentences.en: He toyed with the idea of going to China.
sentences.cn: 他动过去中国的念头，但并没当真。

sentences.en: In China bats are thought of as being very lucky.
sentences.cn: 在中国，蝙蝠被视为吉祥物。

sentences.en: Our china can be bought off the shelf or by commission.
sentences.cn: 我们的瓷器可现货购买，也可以委托制作。

sentences.en: Relations between Japan and China have recently been on the mend.
sentences.cn: 最近,中日关系在向好的方面发展.

sentences.en: She got out the best china.
Tables are set with white china and gold-banded silver cutlery.
sentences.cn: 桌上摆放着白色瓷器和镶着金边的银制餐具。

sentences.en: The company looks poised to make a significant breakthrough in China.
sentences.cn: 这家公司看来很有把握在中国取得重大突破。

sentences.en: The Foreign Minister is to visit China.
sentences.cn: 外交大臣将要访问中国。

sentences.en: The only sound is that of knives and forks scraping against china.
sentences.cn: 只听见刀叉摩擦瓷器的刺耳声。

phrases.tran_cn: 中国移动通讯（世界500强之一）
